Hello,

I am trying to complete part A of pset 4, but I am confused on how to reference individual nodes when determining the height of the tree.

I think I understand the general idea that to find the height recursively; we check if the tree is just a leaf (aka the just a Node(x) where x is some number). If it is another subtree I believe we need to call it recursively: Node(x) + (find_tree_height(right node)+find_tree_height(left node) (please correct me if this logic is wrong). However, I am unsure how to get reference the Nodes themselves (aka the Node(x) part), and would appreciate some guidance. Thank you in advance!
subject: How to reference individual nodes
